mov r1,#3 	- 00001100010000000000000000000011 - C400003
mov r2,#5	- 00001100100000000000000000000101 - C800005 
mov r3,#0	- 00001100110000000000000000000000 - CC00000
strmd r2,[r3]	- 00100000000100110000000000000000 - 20130000
add r3,r1,r2	- 00000100110010100000000000000000 - 4CA0000
mov r4,#8	- 00001101000000000000000000001000 - D000008
strmd r3,[r4]	- 00100000000111000000000000000000 - 201C0000
ldrmd r1,[r4]	- 00100100011000000000000000000000 - 24600000

//------------
mov r3,#0	- 00001100110000000000000000000000 - CC00000
ldrmi r7 	- 00101101110000000000000000000000 - 2DC00000
add r7,r7,#1	- 00000101111110000000000000000001 - 5F80001
str r7		- 00101000001110000000000000000000 - 28380000

add r4,r2,#2	- 00000101000100000000000000000010 - 5100002
sub r5,r2,r1	- 00001001010100010000000000000000 - 9510000
sub r6,r2,#1	- 00001001100100000000000000000001 - 9900001
div r7,r2,#5	- 00010001110100000000000000000101 - 11D00005
mult r1,r1,#3	- 00010100010010000000000000000011 - 14480003
and r4,r2,r3	- 00011001000100110000000000000000 - 19130000
or r5,r5,r5	- 00011101111111110000000000000000 - 1DFF0000
